New Records: Michel Aebischer scored his first international goal in the match.
Breel Embolo scored the winning goal for Switzerland in the 90th minute.
Key Match Events: Hungary scored their first goal in the 66th minute via Barnabas Varga.
Switzerland scored three goals, with Michel Aebischer doubling their lead at halftime.
Breel Embolo's late goal sealed the match for Switzerland.
Pre-Game Insights: Switzerland dominated the first half with two goals from Michel Aebischer and Kwadwo Duah.
Hungary struggled to contain Switzerland's attacking plays.
Post-Match Reflections: Jonathan Wilson noted Switzerland's impressive performance and Hungary's late fightback.
Breel Embolo's contribution was significant despite limited playing time.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match saw several substitutions, including Breel Embolo and Fabian Rieder coming on for Switzerland.
Others: The game was part of Euro 2024, with Switzerland progressing in the tournament.
